full_text.full_text:
Data Preprocessing
▪ Additional steps to make the data more suitable for data mining
▪ A broad area and consists of a number of different strategies 
and techniques that are interrelated in complex ways
▪ We will discuss the following topics:
– Aggregation
– Sampling
– Dimensionality reduction
– Feature selection
– Feature creation
– Discretization and binarization
– Variable transformation
27
